title: Midnite spares
creator_credit: Quentin Masters, Tom Burstall and Filmco
brief_description: A group of criminals strip cars for their parts and are involved in a kidnapping. When the man’s son returns home after a long absence, he embarks on a chaotic rescue mission with the help of a few friends. Stars James Laurie, Gia Carides, Max Cullen and Bruce Spence.
